items.title: Behind the Scenes of Guillermo del Toro’s FRANKENSTEIN
items.description: Noted book lover Jacob Elordi plays Frankenstein's monster, indie bookstores see the Trump bump on titles about tyranny, and more.

items.title: Book Riot’s Deals of the Day for July 28, 2025
items.description: Spontaneously combusting children, an Appalachian story, a magical Regency England, and more of today's best book deals.

items.title: Who Was Pat Parker?
items.description: Most feminists know of Audre Lorde, but one of her closest friends is often lost between the lines of history: Pat Parker.

items.title: Meet The Hardest Reading Challenge You’ll Ever Do
items.description: True to its name, The Hardest Reading Challenge You'll Ever Do is a nigh-impossible year-long reading challenge. Would you try it?

items.title: Goods for Cozy Fantasy Readers
items.description: These gifts for cozy fantasy readers will add a touch of magic and comfort to your reading routine, from stickers to cozy crewnecks.
